Name: Ptah-Sokar-Osiris statuette
Description: Wooden statuette of a mummiform Ptah-Sokar-Osiris. A red fillet has been painted on the blue striated wig. The head-dress is now missing. The chest is covered by a brightly striped collar with multiple rows. The red body is covered by a black net. The two vertical columns of text on the front and the back contain a prayer to Osiris. The lid of the high base is missing.
